Name: No Hard Feelings
Review: Light hearted This movie had potential to be great, but it falls short and feels incomplete. I liked some funny and emotional moments, but overall, it's lacking that special touch. With a bit more work, it could have been significantly better. Ultimately, it's worth a single watch.

Name: Por Thozhil
Review: An Absolute crime thriller! This movie kicks off without any time wasted. The characters and their development are impressively written. The first half is thrilling, but I found some scenes in the second half predictable. However, they managed to keep the suspense intact from the pre-climax. Overall, it's a solid crime thriller.

Name: Chhichhore
Review: Chhichhore holds a special place in my heart as a cult film due to the relatable characters and the bonding between them and most importantly the never give up attitude played a huge impact on me.
